member.name: T:TerrariansConstructLib.API.Numbers.Roman
member.summary:
A helper class for converting positive, non-zero integers into their Roman number equivalents, using various formats
Only numbers > 0 and <= 3999 are supported

member.name: F:TerrariansConstructLib.API.Numbers.RomanFormat.SubtractiveConventional
member.summary: Subtractive format. IX = 9, XLIX = 49, CMXCIX = 999

member.name: F:TerrariansConstructLib.API.Numbers.RomanFormat.SubtractiveNonConventional
member.summary: Subtractive format. IX = 9, IL = 49, IM = 999

member.name: F:TerrariansConstructLib.API.Numbers.RomanFormat.Additive
member.summary: Additive format. XVIIII = 9, XXXXVIIII = 49, DCCCCXXXXVIIII = 999

member.name: M:TerrariansConstructLib.Modifiers.BaseTrait.SaveData(Terraria.ModLoader.IO.TagCompound)
member.summary:
Allows you to save custom data for this ability.
NOTE: The provided tag is always empty by default, and is provided as an argument only for the sake of convenience and optimization.
NOTE: Try to only save data that isn't default values.
member.param: The TagCompound to save data into. Note that this is always empty by default, and is provided as an argument only for the sake of convenience and optimization.

member.name: M:TerrariansConstructLib.Modifiers.BaseTrait.LoadData(Terraria.ModLoader.IO.TagCompound)
member.summary:
Allows you to load custom data that you have saved for this item.
Try to write defensive loading code that won't crash if something's missing.
member.param: The TagCompound to load data from.
